InfluenceRule.name: Initiator wants to pick on r
Responder is sympathetic, something bad has happened to the initiator
R has a crush on i
R wants to pick on i
%i% has done some negative things to %r%
%i% has done some positive things to %r%

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %r% took that insult from %i% WAY too nicely
%i% didn't notice that %rs% got a haircut
%i% didn't notice that %rs% got a haircut but it was all good
%i% checked out %o% and %rs% was totally into it
%i% thought it was a good idea to compare %r% to %o%
%r% added %CKB_((i,dislikes),(r,likes),())%s to the list of forbidden topics to discuss with %i%
%i% covered up talking to %o% in front of %r%
%i% accidently revealed that embarrassing story about %r% to the world

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%! You look different today.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Are you saying I look like a %pejorative%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You totally do!
Uh... I mean, like, in a good way! You know!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm not a %pejorative%, %i%. YOU'RE the %pejorative%!!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%! You look different today.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What... like a %pejorative% or something?
Your honest criticism means a lot to me, %sweetie%. I promise to work harder not to be such a %pejorative% so we can make this relationship work.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%! Looking good as usual.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: As USUAL? Don't you notice anything different about me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... no?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I totally got a haircut. I can't believe you didn't even notice.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%! You're looking good as usual.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: As usual? Don't you notice anything different about me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... no?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I totally got a haircut. I can't believe you didn't even notice.
But that's okay. Your total inability to notice things is part of your goofy charm.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. %random(Did you,Have you,When did,What's the)%- whoah, check out %o%! What a %gender(o,stud,hottie)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Excuse me? Eyes over here, %gender(i,buster,missy)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... uh... I mean... not that you're not...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Save it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%. So where did- man, check out %o%! What a %gender(o,hunk,babe)%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No kidding. Wouldn't I love to get my hands on %gender(r,THOSE abs,THAT body)%. Raaarrrr!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... uh... I thought... err.....

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Later, %sweetie%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %sweetie%, I've been thinking. I wish there was more fire in our relationship. Like that time when %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I get it. You want me to be just like %o%, is that it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No! That's not what I meant at all!
Just a LITTLE more like %o%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I so don't want to talk to you right now.
Hey %sweetie%, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nothing much... I was just thinking... sometimes, %o% is so much cooler than you are.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's really true. I can be such a dork.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Wait, what?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Who wouldn't want to be like %o%? But I'll try to be more like %pron(o,him/her)% for you, %sweetie%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, cool.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, what's up?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Nothing much... I was just thinking... sometimes, %o% is so much cooler than you are.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, I'm not cool enough for you? Is that it?
You want me to be just like %gender(o,big daddy,little miss)% cool over there? Well guess what, buddy, I'M your %gender(r,boy,girl)%friend, not %o%, got it?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, sure thing, %sweetie%.
So I was watching TV the other night, and guess what came on?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I dunno, what?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That %pejorative%ish show about %toc1%s! God, I can't stand it! If I hear one more thing about %toc1%s, I'm gonna blow!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I happen to like %toc1%s... a lot. It's like you don't even know me!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh CRAP! I totally knew that, what was I thinking...
No! %sweetie%! I love %toc1%s! I didn't mean it!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey %sweetie%. I really wish you'd watch my favorite %toc1% show sometime with me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: OMG, really!? %toc1%s are SO LAME! They're totally for %pejorative%s!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What! No way! They're awesome! How could you be so different than me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Come on, %sweetie%. You gotta outgrow %toc1%s someday.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Absolutely not. But I guess we can add it to the list.
'Topics not to be discussed: religion, politics, music, fashion, and.... %toc1%s.'

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %sweetie%! %o%! How are you?
Erm... Uhh... Ah....

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Is that what they call a Freudian slip? Am I not hot enough for you that you forgot my NAME!? Because it sure isn't *%o%*!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: No no no no! It was a total accident! %o% just texted me, I'm so sorry, %sweetie%!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I can't believe you. My name is %r%. Don't you forget it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%! How yah doing?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm alright, you know, just kickin' it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Cool, cool. Oh wait, hold on a sec - getting a phone call.
Oh hey! What's up? Mhm... Yeah. Definitely. See you tonight, babe.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Babe? Just WHO were you talking to? You better not be seeing someone behind *my* back!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh crap. Oh crap....
No! No, I'm not seeing anyone. No, not at all. That was just my cousin. She's 'French'. It's normal to call French people, 'babe'.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Uh huh. Well you better only be seeing *me* tonight.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Of course, %sweetie%.
Man... %o% is not going to be happy about this raincheck.

Instantiation.name: BrashRemark - Reveal embarrassing fact about responder.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: So let me get this straight. I shouldn't tell anyone that %toc1%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: It's not what you think.
Great! Now everyone knows.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well at least it isn't a secret anymore.
%sweetie%, guess what? I totally had my favorite %toc1% gold-plated!
It cost a lot of money, but it was so worth it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You did *what*? Are you an idiot? I thought you were saving that money %random(so we could go on a romantic senior trip together,to get us an apartment together after we graduate,to buy me something nice for graduation,to fix up my car)%!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh.. uhhh.... I guess I forgot about that.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well you can forget about these lips getting close to yours anytime soon, too.
